blocks.name: csgn
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the Signum function.

blocks.name: df-sgn
blocks.content: Signum function. We do not call it "sign", which is homophonic with "sine" ( ~ df-sin ). Defined as "sgn" in ISO 80000-2:2009(E) operation 2-9.13. It is named "sign" (with the same definition) in the "NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions" , front introduction, "Common Notations and Definitions" section at ~ http://dlmf.nist.gov/front/introduction#Sx4 . We define this over ` RR* ` ( ~ df-xr ) instead of ` RR ` so that it can accept ` +oo ` and ` -oo ` . Note that ~ df-psgn defines the sign of a permutation, which is different. Value shown in ~ sgnval . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: sgnval
blocks.content: Value of the signum function. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgnval(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(cfv(csgn, c0), cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0))))
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cxr, csgn, cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0)), cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)))
  ifbieq2d(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, nat0)), cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, nat0)
  ifbid(cneg(nat1), nat1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, nat0), wbr(c0, clt, nat0))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, clt, nat0)
  df-sgn(hs0)
  ifex(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  c0ex()
  ifex(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0))
  negex(nat1)
  1ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sgnval(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ* →(sgn ` c0)= if(c0 = 0, 0, if(c0[<]0, -u(1), 1)))
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cxr, csgn, if(c0 = 0, 0, if(c0[<]0, -u(1), 1)), if(hs0 = 0, 0, if(hs0[<]0, -u(1), 1)))
  ifbieq2d(nat0, if(hs0[<]0, -u(1), 1), if(c0[<]0, -u(1), 1), hs0 = c0, hs0 = 0, c0 = 0)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, nat0)
  ifbid(-u(1), nat1, hs0 = c0, hs0[<]0, c0[<]0)
  breq1(hs0, c0, clt, nat0)
  df-sgn(hs0)
  ifex(nat0, if(c0[<]0, -u(1), 1), c0 = 0)
  c0ex()
  ifex(-u(1), nat1, c0[<]0)
  negex(nat1)
  1ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(if(c0 = 0, 0, if(c0[<]0, -u(1), 1)))
}

blocks.name: sgnp
blocks.content: The signum of a positive extended real is 1. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgnp(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wceq(cfv(csgn, c0), nat1))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(csgn, c0), nat1, cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0)), cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(cfv(csgn, c0), cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0))))
  sgnval(c0)
  iffalsed(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  neneqd(c0, nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  xrltne(nat0, c0)
  iffalsed(cneg(nat1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, nat0))
  imp(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cxr), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  xrltnsym(nat0, c0)
}

blocks.name: sgnn
blocks.content: The signum of a negative extended real is -1. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgnn(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(cfv(csgn, c0), cneg(nat1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(csgn, c0), cneg(nat1), cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0)), cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wceq(cfv(csgn, c0), cif(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0))))
  sgnval(c0)
  iffalsed(nat0, cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wn(wceq(c0, nat0)), wne(nat0, c0))
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wne(nat0, c0), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  xrltne(c0, nat0)
  nesym(nat0, c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wceq(cif(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), cneg(nat1)))
  iftrue(cneg(nat1), nat1, wbr(c0, clt, nat0))
}
